definition: unit (of measure)/unit (group of people as a whole)/work unit (place of employment, esp. in the PRC prior to economic reform)/CL:個|个[ge4]
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential
Major Historical and Cultural Site Protected at the National Level
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Zhong4 dian3 Wen2 wu4 Bao3 hu4 Dan1 wei4
containing_words.word: 全国重点文物保护单位

sentences.english: Fourth, the failure is beyond the unit's will.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪行为未达既遂是由于单位意志以外的原因。

sentences.english: The applicants who pass the qualification pre-evaluation will receive the formal invitation for Levy.
sentences.chinese: 主办单位向资审合格的应征人发出正式邀请。

sentences.english: I met few people congenial to me in the department.
sentences.chinese: 在那个单位里我没碰到几个意气相投的人。

sentences.english: Now, another useful notion is the unit vector to the trajectory.
sentences.chinese: 还有一个有用的概念就是轨道的单位矢量。

sentences.english: The fundamental unit of the hierarchy is the association .
sentences.chinese: 等级系统中的基本单位是群丛。

sentences.english: In most fields, its use has been replaced by the ‘joule’.
sentences.chinese: 在大多数领域，这个单位已经被“焦耳”取代。

sentences.english: To be responsible for the party-masses work of Administration and its directly affiliated institutions.
sentences.chinese: 负责局机关及直属单位的党群工作。

sentences.english: Objective To probe the nephron spring surgery for renal neoplasms.
sentences.chinese: 目的评估保留肾单位手术治疗肾肿瘤的效果。

sentences.english: Three portfolio units-internally set and marked. Work based learning evidence.
sentences.chinese: 三个内部单位组合设置和标记。

sentences.english: The applicant for supervisory unit qualification shall submit the following documents to the SMCAC.
sentences.chinese: 申请监理单位资质，应当向市建委提供下列材料。

sentences.english: The solid mineralizing model for a underground gold mine is researched on the basis of orebody block as a unit.
sentences.chinese: 以矿块为单位，研究某地下金矿的实体矿化模型。

sentences.english: No unit or individual may have cultural relics transferred without approval.
sentences.chinese: 未经批准，任何单位或者个人不得调取文物。

sentences.english: The per unit area yield of ginned cotton has increased by 10% over last year.
sentences.chinese: 皮棉的单位面积产量比去年增加了10%。

sentences.english: What are the units here? We write 12.011.
sentences.chinese: 这些单位是什么呢，我们写12。

sentences.english: Developer will sign an agreement with each participant for the fee payment.
sentences.chinese: 承办方将与各投标单位签订协议，以支付相应费用。

sentences.english: Candidates can attend the test with he admission ticket issued by the testing site.
sentences.chinese: 考生持主考单位核发的“准考证”进入考场参加考试。

definition: people's organization (eg. labor unions, peasant associations, scholarly associations etc)/mass organization
government (viewed as an organization)/institutions of government/government office
administrative unit (e.g. province 省[sheng3], prefecture 地區|地区[di4 qu1] or county 縣|县[xian4])
to work/(of a machine) to operate/job/work/task/CL:個|个[ge4],份[fen4],項|项[xiang4]
